title: Let RetryPolicy throw exception when number of attempts exhausted
body:
Remove the return value from attempt() so it either succeeds or throws exception
Add AttemptsExceededException to indicates number of attempts exhausted

The reason for this change is to prevent using RetryPolicy without checking the return value which might cause silent failure.

title: Minimize window in which two controllers can update metadata for LLC segment commit
body:
It is possible that the leader controller undergoes heavy GC after accepging the
segment commit request from a server. In this case, the leader could lose zk connection
for a while and wait to regain connection in order to test leadership.  During this time
another controller could gain leadership and commit the metadata, with a slightly different
kafka offset, and create a new segment. Meanwhile, the former leader, without knowing that it
has lost leadership, could go ahead and commit another new realtime segment, which could
have a different name than the segment committed by the new leader!

We minimize the window of this happening by checking one more time right before we commit
metadata.

Also, we check for leadership as well as zk connectivity instead of just leadership check.

Added unit tests

title: Added a descriptive status on ServiceStatus to get an indication of what it is waiting for
body:
Often happens that a service is not finished starting up yet because of a specific table or
partition being not available yet. Since we don't log each time we return a STARTING status,
it is good to keep track of what we are waiting for and provide an interface to retrieve it.

title: Implement the segment upload protocol
body:
Added custom map in segment ZK metadata
Added query parameter for parallel push protection
Modified BaseSegmentConversionExecutor to enable push retry, set custom map properly, and enable parallel push protection for minion.

For refresh case, upload segment as following steps:
1. Check IF-MATCH CRC if existing
2. Lock the segment if parallel push protection enabled
3. Update the custom map in segment ZK metadata
4. Update the segment ZK metadata (also unlock the segment)

title: Revert changes and fix bugs on detection
body:
In my previous pull request, my old version of code override the previous changes. This pull request is to revert my previous changes on the methods.
Also, a fix has been pushed to resolve the problem that some anomalies were not detected. The root cause is that we have old BaseAnomalyFunction and new AbstractModularizedAnomalyFunction. When we init the functions, it takes the init in AbstractModularizedAnomalyFunction, but BaseAnomalyFunction. However, the detection task takes properties from BaseAnomalyFunction. An exception was thrown, and failed to detect.

title: Add timezone support in dateTimeConvert udf
body:
Extending dateTimeFormat to include timezone information along with the sdf pattern. The timezone for an sdf datetime can be defined by adding tz(timezone) at the end of the sdf pattern. The tiemzone can be defined either as long form (America/Los_Angeles), or short form (PST) or in terms of GMT (GMT-0700). If no timezone is provided, UTC will be used as default.

Updated https://github.com/linkedin/pinot/wiki/dateTimeConvert-UDF

title: Remove dateTimeType from dateTimeFieldSpec
body:
DateTimeType was added to be able to distinguish between primary and derived datetime types. Knowing which is primary is necessary for retention, and time boundary service. However this information need not be in the schema, and can instead be the responsibility of table config. Hence, removing dateTimeType enum from dateTimeFieldSpec.
We will be extending derived flag to all field specs instead of just dateTimeField.

3) Single value and multi value columns

title: [TE] rootcause - extended metric analysis
body:
This PR extends the RCA backend to support MetricEntities with a filter tail in the URN. Adds a specialized pipeline for mapping between metric entities that also translates filters if possible. Furthermore extends the one-step dimension analysis pipeline into an iterative component/factor analysis. Also adds a complement of unit tests and helpers.

* long-format metric urns ("thirdeye:metric:12345:filter=value:otherFilter=otherValue")

* support long-format urns in metric-related RCA pipelines

* iterative metric component analysis pipeline (restricted PCA)

* exclusion filters in thirdeye-requests ("filter != value")

title: [TE] Implement Onboarding Job and Tasks
body: Current onboarding tasks are run in a wrapper. This design is hard to manage and is unable to get the task status. With the help of flexible job and tasks by @cyenjung, we are able to implement a onboarding job with multiple tasks, and there is endpoint to retrieve the job status and exceptions. This pr is to implement and replace the current wrapper by the onboarding job.

title: [MINION] Add PurgeTaskExecutor
body:
Added SegmentPurger class to purge segment.
- SegmentPurger takes a RecordPurger and a RecordModifier.
- For each record, we first determine whether it should be purged (removed), if not, then determine whether it should be modified.
Added RecordPurgerFactory and RecordModifierFactory interface that can be injected through MinionContext singleton class.
Added SegmentPurgerTest and PurgeTaskExecutor

title: [TE] rootcause poc - add user-readable alerts on data error
body:
The UI currently does not surface data retrieval errors to the user. This PR adds basic user-readable error message and enables message dismissal.

title: [PINOT-5458] Remove static initialization of classes in SegmentFetcherFactory
body:
Static initialization of classes in SegmentFetcher factory can have unneeded exception stack trace
when the system starts up. The HttpsSegmentFetcher, for example, will throw (and log) initialization
exceptions, even if it is overridden with some other class. This poses a problem for deployments with
automated exception detection, not to mention unnecessary exception logs confusing the admin when
they have configured a different class.

Removed static initialization in the SegmentFetcherFactory class.

If initSegmentFetcherFactory is not called, then map of protocol to SegmentFetcher is not populated.

title: [TE] Create detection onboarding execution pipeline
body:
Create an in-memory job executor that runs job's linear tasks. This executor satifies the following requirement for detection onboarding jobs:
1. One job could have multiple tasks.
2. Error message of task and job execution could be propagate back to job executor.
3. Task failure could be ignore (i.e., job execution continues) if "abortAtFailure = false" for that task.

Tested with unit tests to ensure the requirements are fullfilled.

title: [TE] Alert Page: report anomaly + routes for tune/edit
body:
This is mainly an expansion of the 'manage.alert' route into sub-routes to handle:
- Alert details (manage.alert.explore)
- Alert edit (manage.alert.edit)
- Alert tuning (manage.alert.tune)

Features added:
- Missing alert report link/modal
- Sub-route tab navigation

title: Clean up dependency issues
body:
Cleaned up various dependency issues:
 - Remove child POM dependency versions, move all version numbers to the
   parent POM
 - Fixed httpclient being specified twice with two different version
   numbers (4.1.3 and 4.2.5)
 - Fixed having multiple versions of mockito in different projects
   (1.8.4 and 2.10.0)
